case.title: Looking for an honest real woman - 45 (New Jersey )
case.text: Well I have posted all over , seems not many in my area so here is what I am looking for , someone younger then me skinny to a little chunky . If things worked out being together for life . I can not move so you would have to I am in South Jersey , very nice told good looking , live with my 10 yr old daughter so no drama , kids are fine but you need to be able to help I am not rich LOL to weed out spam put I don't cheat in the reply , seems that is not working to well LOL must love animals and be DDF
